roleset.name: (cause to) be uncoiled

example.name: unwind-v: specialized financial usage
example.text: And senior officials of two U.S. securities houses say they switched trades in European stocks to the London market last week when they couldn't unwind positions on the Continent.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: And senior officials of two U.S. securities houses say they switched trades in European stocks to the London market last week when they could n't unwind positions on the Continent .

example.name: unwinding-n
example.text: For an intercalator to fit between base pairs , the bases must separate , distorting the DNA strands by unwinding of the double helix .

roleset.note: UNWIND-V NOTES: Comparison with 'wind'. VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls bend-45.2 (from unwind.01-v)
UNWINDING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for clearearth-biotexts.

roleset.name: relax

example.name: unwind-v: hot summer days
example.text: After a long day of work, John likes to relax with a nap in his hammock.
example.arg: with a nap in his hammock.

roleset.note: UNWIND-V NOTES: Frames file for 'unwind' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. (from unwind.02-v predicate notes)
